title: Los Angeles School Police Reduce Vulnerabilities with Mobile Risk Assessment
text:
28 Los Angeles School Police Reduce Vulnerabilities with Mobile Risk Assessment 
Center for Digital Education: School violence has become a widespread problem across the country, prompting district decision-makers and administrators to discuss strategies for preventing crime from occurring in the first place.
